attributes.title: Savoury Chef - Supplier Showcase
attributes.description: The following is a source map that outlines a good amount of our regular suppliers that we use.

attributes.address: Cultus Lake, Fraser Valley E, BC, Canada
attributes.title: Yarrow Meadows Duck

attributes.description: Located on the west coast of Canada near Qualicum Beach, British Columbia, Island Scallops represents Canada's largest private marine research hatchery and first fully-integrated shellfish producer. The Company has pioneered scallop culture in BC since 1989, and has developed the premium hybrid "Pacific Scallop" for farming in local waters. Island Scallops is committed to environmentally sustainable production of a high quality, all-natural product.
attributes.address: 5552 West Island Highway, Qualicum Beach, BC V9K 2E7, Canada
attributes.title: Island Bay Scallops

attributes.address: 826 Renfrew Street, Vancouver, BC V5K 2N5, Canada
attributes.title: Savoury Chef Foods Ltd.
Maple Hill Farms Chicken and Eggs
attributes.address: 4808 Mount Lehman Road, Abbotsford, BC V4X 1Z4, Canada
attributes.description: Maple Hill Farms Free-Range and Certified Organic Free-Range Eggs are produced by hens which have the best quality of life we can give them. They are fed a ration which is grain/vegetable based, non-medicated, and contains no animal by-products or antibiotics.

attributes.title: Sawmill Bay Shellfish Company
attributes.description: From the pristine, glacier-fed waters off Read Island, shellfish from Sawmill Bay are fresh, flavoursome and exquisitely enjoyable. These shellfish come to you direct from our two family-run farms, delivered locally within 24 hours of harvesting. We use the sawmill bay beach oyster, along with an alternative kushi oysters at our oyster bars.

attributes.title: Glorious Organics Co-Op
attributes.description: Initially formed as Glorious Garnish and Seasonal Salad Company Ltd in 1986, we became an official workers co-op in 2006, changing our name to Glorious Organics Co-op. We produce over thirty varieties of salad greens as well as peas, beans, potatoes, carrots, beets, onions, garlic, fennel, fruits, herbs, flowers and much more! We sell directly to restaurants, farmers markets (under the name Organic Farm Connection), and through our CSA program.

attributes.title: Qualicum Bay Scallops to Savoury Chef Foods Ltd.
attributes.description:
Located on the west coast of Canada near Qualicum Beach, British Columbia, Island Scallops represents Canada's largest private marine research hatchery and first fully-integrated shellfish producer. 

The Company has pioneered scallop culture in BC since 1989, and has developed the premium hybrid "Pacific Scallop" for farming in local waters.

Island Scallops is committed to environmentally sustainable production of a high quality, all-natural product.

attributes.title: Maple Hill Farms Chicken and Free Range Eggs
attributes.description: Maple Hill chickens are raised medication and antibiotic free, given plenty of natural light and room to move freely in the barns. They are fed vegetable based rations and are 100% free of animal by-products.
